column4: Tourism;Phnom Penh: Three drunken Australians were arrested by police after causing a disturbance around Koh Pich on the afternoon of July 19.------At 7:00 pm
column5: the Office of Investigation and Implementation of the Immigration received three Australians from the Tonle Bassac
column7: Phnom Penh.------The trio have been charged with being drunk and disorderly.
